page.title: 10TOURISM CONTD
page.content: were. At Moulin Huet Pottery,visitors can see a potter at his wheel,the articles ready for firing and buy the finished products.St Martins Church (see Local History) can be visited as can the "martello" towers,German batteries,magazines and the German Military Cemetery.Sausmarez Manor is open to the public who may also visit the model railway and ride on the miniature train.There is a putting green behind St Martins Primary School and the paths on the cliffs are well-trodden.Some tourists go in search of the caves found along these cliffs.Every year the Southern Agricultural and Horticultural Society Show is held in the fields behind Sauamarez Manor.The local people enter their fruit,vegetables,pets and livestock to be judged and there are equestrian competitions as well as a
